author: cms-trackeralign
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements a RelVal to PR #46888, which introduced a new High Granularity Tracker Alignment Prompt Calibration Loop using both MinumumBias and Z   data ("HG Combined alignment"), aiming to provide alignment conditions for the High Level Triggers (HLT). 
The new RelVal has the id 1002.5.

#### PR validation:

The following command was successfully used to validate:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l 1002.5 --ibeos
```

Cc: @mmusich @henriettepetersen @TomasKello
title: Addition of RelVal to HLT HG Combined PCL workflow
